page.title: 19LOCAL HISTORY_MRS DARK
page.content: { Mrs Dark}has lived in{St Merryn }for {33}years.The houses were not so modern when she first moved to St Merryn,they didnt have any central heating or any electric gadgets as we do today.Mrs Dark used to use oil lamps,open fires,candles and a stove.At first there were no{bungalows}at Harlyn Road nor were there any bungalows at Donkey Park or Parc Eglos.There were 2 shops at the cross roads and the roads were not Tarmacked.Trethithic Estate didn't exist until after the Second World War and there were no houses along the road by the school.The cottages down at church town and the cottages on the left as you go to Trethithic Estate are the oldest in St.Merryn.
